ST. LOUIS The Cardinals will be heading to Toronto for their next series but won't be bringing 2022 All-Stars Paul Goldschmidt and Nolan Arenado, as well as backup catcher Austin Romine with them.

articles.author: Alex Sherman
articles.title: National Football League's new streaming service NFL+ launches at $4.99 per month - CNBC
articles.description: The NFL's new streaming service will include out-of-market preseason games and mobile access to local and prime-time games.
articles.content:
The National Football League now has its own streaming service.
Premiering Monday, the NFL is launching NFL+ for $4.99 per month or $39.99 per year.
A subscription will include all out-of-market pr… [+3015 chars]
